value.title: Generate Year and Month Combinations in Power BI Report using DAX
value.excerpt: A common requirement when reporting data with a Date axis is to be able to see the year and the month in a short form beside each other. value.excerpt: Power BI reports are highly interactive, If you select a column in a column chart other charts will be highlighted.
